title: 02/23/22 DPS Hour 3 - Rob Parker & Ben Maller Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/23/22 DPS Hour 3 - Rob Parker & Ben Maller Guest Hosting
description:
Rob Parker and Ben Maller, filling in for Dan, discuss why Rob holds daily block parties on Twitter featuring a few of your favorite FOX Sports Radio personalities, debate what - if anything - the NBA can do to save the Slam Dunk contest, and tell us why nobody seemed to care about the Winter Olympics this year. Plus, Super Bowl champion Brady Poppinga swings by to discuss Aaron Rodgers' future in Green Bay, how Davante Adams' contract situation factors into all this, which landing spot makes the most sense if he indeed asks to be traded, how Rodgers tries to manipulate the media from time to time, and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
